20101224025158.000|20101224025202.000|CC1|  games with my grandchildren.  
20101224025202.000|20101224025203.000|CC1|           Great news!          
20101224025203.000|20101224025203.000|CC1|      For people with COPD,     
20101224025203.000|20101224025206.000|CC1|  including chronic bronchPGiti
20101224025206.000|20101224025208.000|CC1|       emphysema, or both,      
20101224025208.000|20101224025208.000|CC1|   ADVAIR helps significantly   
20101224025208.000|20101224025210.000|CC1|     improve lung function.     
20101224025210.000|20101224025212.000|CC1| While nothing can reverse COPD,
20101224025212.000|20101224025212.000|CC1|  ADVAIR is different from most 
20101224025212.000|20101224025215.000|CC1|     other COPD medications     
20101224025215.000|20101224025215.000|CC1|       because it contains      
20101224025215.000|20101224025217.000|CC1|    both an anti-inflammatory   
20101224025217.000|20101224025217.000|CC1|        and a long-acting       
20101224025217.000|20101224025219.000|CC1|         bronchodilator,        
20101224025219.000|20101224025219.000|CC1|        working together        
20101224025219.000|20101224025221.000|CC1|   to help you breathe better.  
20101224025221.000|20101224025221.000|CC1|ADVAIR won't replace fast-acting
20101224025221.000|20101224025225.000|CC1|  inhalers for sudden symptoms  
20101224025225.000|20101224025225.000|CC1|        and should not be       
20101224025225.000|20101224025227.000|CC1|   used more than twice a day.  
20101224025227.000|20101224025229.000|CC1| People with COPD taking ADVAIR 
20101224025229.000|20101224025229.000|CC1|    may have a higher chance    
20101224025229.000|20101224025230.000|CC1|          of pneumonia.         
20101224025230.000|20101224025230.000|CC1|       ADVAIR may increase      
20101224025230.000|20101224025233.000|CC1|    your risk of osteoporosis   
20101224025233.000|20101224025234.000|CC1|     and some eye problems.     
20101224025234.000|20101224025234.000|CC1|        Tell your doctor        
20101224025234.000|20101224025236.000|CC1|  if you have a heart condition 
20101224025236.000|20101224025236.000|CC1|     or high blood pressure     
20101224025236.000|20101224025238.000|CC1|      before taking ADVAIR.
